tiles.name: old_delhi_overview
tiles.description: A sprawling view of Old Delhi, a tapestry of ancient structures and bustling markets, hinting at centuries of history and hidden secrets.

tiles.name: chandni_chowk_market_streets
tiles.description: The heart of Chandni Chowk, a chaotic maze of narrow streets overflowing with merchants, spices, and the vibrant energy of Delhi.

tiles.name: jama_masjid_vicinity
tiles.description: The area surrounding the majestic Jama Masjid, where echoes of Mughal grandeur mingle with the daily life of the city.

tiles.name: red_fort_outer_walls
tiles.description: The imposing outer walls of the Red Fort, a symbol of India's rich history and a silent witness to countless events.

tiles.name: daryaganj_book_market
tiles.description: The bustling Daryaganj book market, a haven for book lovers and a treasure trove of knowledge both old and new.

tiles.name: kashmere_gate_isbt_terminal
tiles.description: The chaotic Kashmere Gate ISBT, a major transportation hub connecting Delhi to the rest of India.

tiles.name: civil_lines_residential_area
tiles.description: A relatively quieter residential area of Civil Lines, offering a respite from the hustle and bustle of Old Delhi.

tiles.name: connaught_place_inner_circle
tiles.description: Connaught Place's inner circle, a colonial-era architectural marvel, now a hub of modern commerce and entertainment.

tiles.name: rajiv_chowk_metro_station
tiles.description: Rajiv Chowk, one of the busiest metro stations in the world, connecting Delhi's vast metro network.

tiles.name: paharganj_backpacker_district
tiles.description: Paharganj, a vibrant backpacker district known for its budget accommodations, international cuisine, and eclectic atmosphere.

tiles.name: new_delhi_railway_station
tiles.description: New Delhi Railway Station, a major railway hub bustling with activity and connecting the city to destinations across India.

tiles.name: karol_bagh_shopping_district
tiles.description: Karol Bagh, a popular shopping district known for its street vendors, clothing stores, and the scent of street food.

tiles.name: jhandewalan_industrial_area
tiles.description: Jhandewalan, an industrial area contributing to Delhi's economic engine, with workshops and factories humming with activity.

tiles.name: lodi_garden_historical_park
tiles.description: Lodi Garden, a serene historical park dotted with ancient tombs and lush greenery, offering a peaceful escape from the city's bustle.

tiles.name: india_gate_memorial
tiles.description: India Gate, a war memorial standing as a symbol of remembrance and national pride, surrounded by sprawling lawns.

tiles.name: president_house_vicinity
tiles.description: The heavily guarded vicinity of the President's House, a symbol of Indian democracy and leadership.

tiles.name: sansad_marg_parliament_street
tiles.description: Sansad Marg, also known as Parliament Street, a vital artery for governance and political activity.

tiles.name: dhaula_kuan_interchange
tiles.description: Dhaula Kuan, a major traffic interchange connecting various parts of Delhi and serving as a vital link for commuters.

tiles.name: delhi_university_north_campus
tiles.description: Delhi University's North Campus, a hub of education, culture, and intellectual discourse.

tiles.name: yamuna_river_banks
tiles.description: The banks of the Yamuna River, flowing through Delhi, its waters carrying both life and ancient secrets.

tiles.name: east_delhi_residential_sector
tiles.description: A densely populated residential sector in East Delhi, representing the diverse communities and daily lives of its inhabitants.

tiles.name: mayur_vihar_extension
tiles.description: Mayur Vihar Extension, a planned residential area, showcasing the evolution of Delhi's urban landscape.

tiles.name: noida_sector_18_commercial_hub
tiles.description: Noida Sector 18, a booming commercial hub across the Yamuna River, reflecting the rapid urbanization of the region.

tiles.name: ghaziabad_industrial_zone
tiles.description: Ghaziabad's industrial zone, an area contributing significantly to the region's manufacturing and economic output.

tiles.name: gurgaon_cyber_hub_tech_center
tiles.description: Gurgaon's Cyber Hub, a modern tech center and bustling commercial area, showcasing the city's rapid growth.

tiles.name: dwarka_expressway_construction
tiles.description: Dwarka Expressway under construction, a sign of Delhi's ever-expanding infrastructure and connectivity.

tiles.name: palam_airport_vicinity
tiles.description: The area surrounding Palam Airport, a vital transportation link to domestic destinations across India.

tiles.name: janakpuri_residential_area
tiles.description: Janakpuri, a well-established residential area in West Delhi, known for its parks and community life.

tiles.name: vikaspuri_district_center
tiles.description: Vikaspuri, a commercial and administrative hub, serving as a focal point for the surrounding region.

tiles.description: Rohini, a planned satellite city, showcasing the efforts to accommodate Delhi's growing population.

tiles.description: Najafgarh, an area transitioning from rural agricultural lands to the outskirts of urban sprawl.
